Blue d'hide chaps are a type of Ranged armour. They require level 50 Ranged in order to be worn.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
22 September 2021
(update)

Blue d'hide chaps have received the following changes:

  • Stab Defence bonus decreased from +25 to +13.
  • Slash Defence bonus decreased from +19 to +16.
  • Crush Defence bonus decreased from +27 to +20.
  • Ranged Defence bonus decreased from +25 to +20.
18 June 2015
(update)

Fixed a stretching issue with void robes and dragonhide chaps whilst using Zul-andra teleport.

4 – 31 October 2005

The item was renamed from "Dragonhide chaps" to "Blue d'hide chaps".

29 March 2004
(update)

The item became permanently available with the launch of RuneScape 2.

22 March 2004
(update)

The item was added to the RuneScape 2 Beta.
